_aChangeLog.text: Stage 4-6, although still difficult, is now much easier

_sText:
FYI: The difficulty comes in running the map, rather than each individual level.

The CSS Bhop port of the infamous quake 3 DeFRaG map "Hangtime 2" by NaturalSpringWater (NSW). Although the original hangtime took me like a month to port and ended up not being very good, this one only took a week, and I paid extra special attention to making it look and feel very good, even if the gameplay is a little awkward.

Every single level is possible, some are just very difficult while others are just a little awkward. I have completed each myself, even if it took me like 10 minutes. 

Difficulty: Hard - Insane
Difficulty (Casual Runs): Medium - Hard
Length: Long - 60 levels in total
Est. Run Time: 5 - 10 mins

Hopefully it ends up as good as I think it might.

EDIT: It has come to my attention that somebody has edited this map and republished it somewhere with the same name (hangtime2_fix). I'm personally fine with people editing my maps; they've been ported to gmod by some russian guys before for instance, but if the one who is doing this is reading this: please save the map as a different name.
